WelcomeManazelAlshafaDesc: Al-Shafa Homes for luxury holiday houses in Al-Shafa city, Taif
raiseComfortLevel: Raise comfort to the highest level
welcomeMessage: Welcome to Manazel Al-Shafa, luxury holiday homes in Al-Shafa, Taif
aboutManazelAlshafa: Manazel Al-Shafa, luxury holiday homes in the city of Al-Shafa, Taif, offers a premium stay that combines comfort and privacy in a charming natural atmosphere. It consists of luxurious suites, making it an ideal destination for families.
manazelDescription: Manazel Al-Shafa offers a refined style marked by tranquility and luxury, featuring charming gardens and stunning natural surroundings. The suites are spacious with modern decor, comfortable furnishings, and breathtaking views of the surrounding nature.
suite1Title: Two Rooms, Living Area, Yard and Pool
suite2Title: One Room, Living Area, and Yard
commonFacilities: Most common facilities in the hotel
suite1.title: Two Bedrooms, Living Room, Courtyard, and Pool
suite1.description: Enjoy a unique stay at *Manazel Al Shafa Holiday Homes*, where tranquility meets luxury. This exquisite suite features two elegant bedrooms, a spacious living room, and a fully equipped kitchen for a comfortable vacation. It also includes a private bathroom and a balcony overlooking a beautiful garden, offering moments of serenity. For added exclusivity, the courtyard provides complete privacy with a private pool that adds a touch of luxury to your stay. A perfect choice for those seeking relaxation in the heart of Al Shafa, Taif.
suite2.title: One Bedroom, Living Room, and Courtyard
suite2.description: Treat yourself to a peaceful and comfortable stay at *Manazel Al Shafa Holiday Homes*. This elegant suite includes a cozy bedroom, a spacious living room for relaxation, and a kitchen equipped with all the essentials you need for an enjoyable stay. The suite features a private courtyard, offering you and your family the perfect space to enjoy the outdoors in privacy, along with an external bathroom for added convenience. The ideal choice for those seeking warmth and seclusion in the heart of Al Shafa.
suite5.title: Accessible Suite
suite5.description: Enjoy a luxurious stay designed to meet your needs. The suite is fully equipped with all comfort amenities, with full consideration for accessibility, ensuring smooth movement and navigation. Special entry points and an additional outdoor bathroom designed for ease of use guarantee you maximum comfort and privacy.
